snippet.textDisplay:
Jagaao mera des, Jagaao Mera des.
Mann mein bhay ki boond bhi naa ho, 
maatha ooncha lehraaye, 
Gyaan mukt aazaad le saanse
dharti bant na paaye, ho..dharti bant na paaye.
Sach ki kokh se shabd janam le, 
karm ki dhaara kalkal, daude registaan cheer de, 
nadi vichar ki chhal chhaal
chauda seena ho abhimaan ka, naa ho tukde tukde, 
Bhaav soorile bandish mein ho aur soorile mukhde, 
Prahaar karo, tum prahaar karo, 
Jagaao mera des..... Jagaao mera des.
snippet.textOriginal:

Sach ki kokh se shabd janam le, 
karm ki dhaara kalkal, daude registaan cheer de, 
nadi vichar ki chhal chhaal
chauda seena ho abhimaan ka, naa ho tukde tukde, 
Bhaav soorile bandish mein ho aur soorile mukhde, 
Prahaar karo, tum prahaar karo, 
Jagaao mera des..... Jagaao mera des.

snippet.textDisplay:
I know 5 languages and I dont know this language, but after hearing him sing I am willing to learn my 6th language. Be proud that somebody like A R Rahman is trying to bring your language to center stage. 
In Tamil Nadu we are more than happy if somebody tries to learn the language. It might sound odd to us, still we encourage whoever tries to learn. Ridiculous is your thinking.
By the way don't compare your mundane knowledge with that of A R's

snippet.textDisplay:
English Version:
Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high/Where knowledge is free/
Where the world has not been broken up into fragments/By narrow domestic walls/Where words come out from the depth of truth/Where tireless striving stretches its arms towards perfection/Whr d clear stream of reason has not lost its way/Into the dreary desert sand of dead habit/Where d mind is led forward by thee/Into ever-widening thought and action/Into that heaven of freedom, let my country awake
snippet.textOriginal:
English Version:
Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high/Where knowledge is free/
Where the world has not been broken up into fragments/By narrow domestic walls/Where words come out from the depth of truth/Where tireless striving stretches its arms towards perfection/Whr d clear stream of reason has not lost its way/Into the dreary desert sand of dead habit/Where d mind is led forward by thee/Into ever-widening thought and action/Into that heaven of freedom, let my country awake

snippet.textDisplay: I personally believe that as copy-write law had been withheld, Tagore's songs become more popular. Now songs of Tagore are more colorful and beautiful as new artists don't follow the traditional Gawky way of singing of Tagore's songs. & as a bong I'm feeling proud to here this song & liking this one very much. Hats of to Rahman Saab. & salute to Suchi also. I want to hear more Bengali songs, specially Tagore's Songs from A.R.Rahman as singer or composer.
snippet.textOriginal: I personally believe that as copy-write law had been withheld, Tagore's songs become more popular. Now songs of Tagore are more colorful and beautiful as new artists don't follow the traditional Gawky way of singing of Tagore's songs. & as a bong I'm feeling proud to here this song & liking this one very much. Hats of to Rahman Saab. & salute to Suchi also. I want to hear more Bengali songs, specially Tagore's Songs from A.R.Rahman as singer or composer.
